title: ssh: server maxCachedPubKeys configurable
body:
by **filirom1**: 
In ssh/server.go, when using publicKeys authentication, it would be nice to choose
maxCachedPubKeys size, or to disable this feature.

I have an ssh server that check in a database if the user exists or not, via the
publicKey.

I don't want cache to shortcut the database.
